definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: Create and copy virtual machine images to multiple workstations.
sentences.chinese: 創建並複製虛擬機映像到多個工作站。

sentences.english: This capability requires these products to be installed on the workstation.
sentences.chinese: 該功能需求在工作站上安裝這些產品。

sentences.english: We had a number of workstations and full-time staff to manually perform the exports.
sentences.chinese: 我們有一些工作站和專職人員來手動地執行導出。

sentences.english: 7 version doctor work station on ex-period training is elucidated.
sentences.chinese: 7版醫生工作站前期培訓工作的重要性。

sentences.english: A replica of the user’s mail database must be created on the user’s workstation.
sentences.chinese: 必須在用戶的工作站上創建用戶郵件數據庫副本。

sentences.english: A software package contains a collection of actions to be performed on a workstation.
sentences.chinese: 一個軟件包包含了一組要在工作站上進行的活動。

sentences.english: The development workstation should have workspace that is configured with the software repository.
sentences.chinese: 開發工作站應該具有配置爲使用軟件存儲庫的工作區。

sentences.english: Either workstation or server can be used for two-processor computers.
sentences.chinese: 工作站或服務器選項都可用於雙處理器計算機。

sentences.english: Library, Diskless Workstation, Network, Reader Service.
sentences.chinese: 圖書館，無盤工作站，網絡，讀者服務。

sentences.english: RIAs will increasingly be used to deliver Information Workplaces.
sentences.chinese: RIA技術會被越來越多地用於交付信息工作站。

sentences.english: A workstation collection has one migration policy and one storage group.
sentences.chinese: 一個工作站集合擁有一個移植策略和一個存儲組。

sentences.english: Is it possible to emulate all those capabilities in the workstation?
sentences.chinese: 是否有可能在工作站中模擬所有這些功能？

sentences.english: Sasser worm exploiting MS workstation service.
sentences.chinese: 震盪波蠕蟲利用質譜工作站服務。

sentences.english: Unzip the file to a location on your workstation.
sentences.chinese: 將文件解壓到工作站上的一個位置。

sentences.english: The catalog information is cashed locally on the client workstation.
sentences.chinese: 目錄信息在客戶機工作站進行本地緩存。

sentences.english: The factory was working two shifts a day, six days a week, and every work station was occupied.
sentences.chinese: 工廠兩班倒，每週上6天，並沒有一個工作站閒置。

definition: to establish/to set up/to be tenable/to hold water
to lead (an animal by the head)/to take the lead/to coordinate (a combined operation)/to mediate/a go-between (e.g. marriage broker)
